plot: Stephen and Sam have been friends since grade school. Sam is notorious for destroying Stephens romantic relationships. Stephen has finally had enough and decides to lay down the law. Trouble brews when Sam falls back into his old ways.
title: Saboteur
plot_es: Stephen and Sam have been friends since grade school. Sam is notorious for destroying Stephens romantic relationships. Stephen has finally had enough and decides to lay down the law. Trouble brews when Sam falls back into his old ways.
plot_en: Stephen and Sam have been friends since grade school. Sam is notorious for destroying Stephens romantic relationships. Stephen has finally had enough and decides to lay down the law. Trouble brews when Sam falls back into his old ways.
